website_summaries.verdict: Brightly colored balls designed to motivate and relieve stress. With 4 to a pack, they are a good value, too.
pros: In addition to being squishy and easy to squeeze, these stress balls are inscribed with motivational phrases for added stress relief
Nice size fits well in the hand
cons: Rare reports of balls with messed up lettering, but customer service has been prompt to reply to issues

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying stress balls
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my students and they loved it! I gave it a few good squeezes and was satisfied. One downside is that one of the designs came off the ball as I was removing it from the package. - Update: The seller sent me a new pack after hearing one of my balls was damaged. The new pack was in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: One of my coworkers recently had surgery so I decided to buy these since he normally take the one from my desk all the time. He likes it alot and they work ust the way I like. Great value and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Romaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Stress Balls!
customer_reviews.text: These stress balls are humorous, colorful, well packaged, quality items. I used them during a morning school presentation as a way of engaging my audience with incentives for answering questions. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: aruberg

customer_reviews.title: Great office gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bags of these stress balls to hand out to my coworkers. They all used them on the very first day and said how much they appreciated them. Some of the sayings were funny while others were motivational. They are the perfect size and seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ashley draper

customer_reviews.title: Stress Away
customer_reviews.text: This product was very good. I am using it as a gift to one of my co workers and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: My hand feels better when I use the ball.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It does what it supposed to do. Excercise is easy with these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Najwa Gianduso

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard or too soft to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I use them for. When clients report being stressed or anxious and unable to leave the classroom or office, they need something to help them. I give them one of these to take. They are perfect. Not too hard to squeeze yet durable to feel the full effect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephijo

customer_reviews.title: Lasted several months in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: By the end of the school year they were falling apart, but that was after LOTS of use by many teenagers. I really enjoyed these fidget squeeze balls-- they're a good size and have good messages. Will buy again for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Joycocello

customer_reviews.title: Durable & motivational stress balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my children to help remind them to use their words and manage their feelings in a healthy way instead of lashing out. They loved the colors and the different sayings on each ball. They have a habit of playing rough with their toys and these have lasted and held up very well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids and they are not durable at all. I didn’t realize the sayings could be peeled off like that. These are a lightweight foam. May work better for adults that want that type of feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great motivational balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these alongside other balls and all have been distributed throughout my work team and have been fairing out great even though we chuck them all over the office! The colour in real life is actually better than the photo online!
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stress Balls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stress balls recently and absolutely love them. They came exactly as advertised and have just the right amount of squish. These are great to have throughout the work day!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stress ball to add strength to your hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because one of my friend in my office recommended me to have a stress ball to enhance strength on hands. I liked the product because every ball has a different tension. I can find the proper tension and choose proper tension for myself. Also, the balls are nice looking with nice lettering in it. I really liked this product. The price is reasonable and it has good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hyunmin

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for colleagues
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, durable, and motivating. Fun gift for adults. I used them as awards for my faculty following a friendly competition at our recent retreat. It's amazing how hard grown-ups will work for a fun stress ball!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Taber Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stress balls! A small bag comes with them, which is great to keep them organized! I would recommend the product and buy them again, definitely a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: nice colors and quotes
customer_reviews.text: The stress balls arrived on time. I really like the bright colors and the quotes. The main reason I picked these balls was the quotes since they were not weird but actually motivational. I out a little bit of lavander oil on them and it's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: EEE

customer_reviews.title: These are a great size for children's hands!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in a school. They are borrowed by children who are sometimes feeling overwhelmed or anxious. Stress balls obviously don't fix everything. However, these do come in great happy colors and are a fabulous size for a child's hand. Plus, they are squishy in a satisfying way. Some stress balls are too hard. These are not.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun sayings!
customer_reviews.text: Love these come in a bag, and every time I grab one and read it they make me laugh while dealing with stress.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love the balls
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and motivation quote on it! I use it for teacher appreciation
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Colorful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. These are soft enough that when I squeeze them they dont hurt my hand. I also like the cute little sayings on them. Keep calm and face palm everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Funny quotes on stress ball,what's not to love
customer_reviews.text: I work for an doctor's office and we use these everyday and they are just awesome! I love the funny sayings on them as well. Fun colors and very reasonable on price. Not too hard and not too soft. Perfect squeeze :)
customer_reviews.author: Texan ENT

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product a lot! The only reason I am giving it only 4 stars is that the orange ball was scuffed up and dirty on one part of the ball. I would buy these again. My nephew and I like to surprise attack each other with these. You can throw them at each other with no pain! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bratina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got it really fast, are exactly what I wanted and what they said it was. Would deff buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: i like that you get so many for the price. they have a great squeeze but i wish they were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great Stress Reliever
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to relieve the stress after a long day. Does the job well, the ball is not too squishy nor too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Diaz

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stress Balls have super cute quotes. Since it comes in a pack of 4, I kept one and used the others as gifts. Firm enough to release the tension and stress away. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yanny

customer_reviews.title: Great stress balls - great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these stress balls! I put them in My teenagers stocking and they were thrilled, too! Perfect texture and “squishiness”
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom
customer_reviews.text: My students and I both love these! They are fun colors and I found what they say to be funny! They are good size and squeezable, good for my execptional learners! I would definately gift to another teacher friend!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a carrying bag!
customer_reviews.text: Good stress balls that I got for students in my classroom. Not too dense of squeaky. Came with a carrying bag and key chain/bottle opener.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: Helps you loosen up every time!
customer_reviews.text: Simple tool to help my Dad loosen up when he becomes upset over little or big things!
customer_reviews.author: JDKII

customer_reviews.title: They LOVED them including the owner of the company
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift to the Project Managers at my job. They LOVED them including the owner of the company! The perfect gift to relieve office stress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stress/Phlebotomy Balls!
customer_reviews.text: I use these balls for patients to squeeze during phlebotomy. They LOVE the cute colors and sayings. It makes the experience a little less scary for my patients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stress balls - exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Good stress balls - just what I was looking for! Nice colors and exactly as pictured! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MMP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected. 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and quotes. I bought these for my child’s Teacher.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Easy to Squeeze
customer_reviews.text: These motivational stress balls are soft, easy to squeeze and fit nicely in your hand. The motivational sayings on each ball will be great for students during our De-Stress Week before Finals!

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for such a price, and with fast shipping in the middle of the pandemic

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Work Stress
customer_reviews.text: Bought some of these for my coworkers as part of their Christmas gifts. Everyone seems to love them and I'm sure they'll get plenty of use...

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Soft and easy to squeeze. I used a gift for students. They loved them.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as "thank you" to presenters at an office meeting. They absolutely loved them.

customer_reviews.text: This product looks exactly like the online pictures. They work well for children who have anxiety issues and just need to calm down. The stress balls work wonders

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really small, font is difficult to read. Works great for children!

customer_reviews.title: Special Needs
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my order. The stress balls were exactly what I wanted. I work with a student with autism, and I am hopeful they will be what he needs.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought them for my nieces who are in college. Can’t wait to mail them the package!

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a work friend and he has worn it out!

customer_reviews.text: Needed some stress balls to get my employees for part of their Christmas gift. These were as advertised and were a real hit!

customer_reviews.title: Stress relief for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I got these for stress relief for my teachers during testing and they were a hit !

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great distraction tool!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute - great for distraction in medical office during procedures
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Great for stress!
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful squeeze balls. They are made of foam and have fun and different phrases on each ball. The foam is dense enough to get a good firm squeeze. The size is perfect for adults and children. Great for choleric temperaments--which usually want to hit or squeeze something when frustrated. I will be keeping one and passing out the other 3 to my friends who will also love them!
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for both stress and arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I got a first set for myself, for use as stress balls, and upon finding that they are well made, durable and can easily be carried in a pocket without permanently flattening, I bought a second set for my mother to use for her arthritis. She's just as pleased as I am. Good stress/exercise balls all around.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan D. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I have a son that is working on managing his anger. He carries one of these in his pocket at all times. I love the motivational quotes and that they came in a pack of four- back-ups are definitely a necessity. They are a little harder to squeeze than most stress balls- but my son prefers these over the softer kind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great--
customer_reviews.text: The stress balls were bright in color and what they had on them was what I was looking for. Only problem was one of the messages on one of the balls was coming off. This is why I gave 4 stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Teacher gifts
customer_reviews.text: Making a bag for each of my childrens teachers this year as an end of the year gift. (Snarky coloring books, markers, head massagers and these stress balls ) the balls are perfect. Great sayings that work for everybody and no evidence of the crackling that sometimes can happen with these. Seem to be well worth the money I would purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: roeynsmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Dr. recommended I get some exercise balls to deal with onset of carpal tunnel. These are perfect. I have one in my car one at home one at work and one in my travel case. They are colorful have a witty message and as I learned after fighting my dog for it — quite resilient
customer_reviews.author: Leonid P.

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids for Easter thinking they would love squeezing them but they are so hard. Not stress relieving whatsoever. I was just expecting something "squishier"

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids, 2 in each stocking. They're inexpensive, just the right size and the right amount of squishy... Good quality. 2 gifts in one...or 4, depending on how many stockings you're stuffing :)

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Office Motivation
customer_reviews.text: We value humor in our office. These were a great way to raise morale and have a little fun. They are colorful and enjoyable. The product was as advertised and is durable.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

product_meta.title: Pure Origins® |"Keep Calm" Funny Motivational Stress Balls | Squeeze Ball Gift 4 Pack | Fidget Accessory for Stress Relief, Concentration, Anxiety, Motivation, ADHD, Autism and Team Building
product_meta.description:
Pure Origins Funny “Keep Calm and” Stress Balls (4 Pack)

Life is too short not to have some humour in it! Brighten up your day with these colourful cute light-hearted stress balls that will never fail to put a smile on your face : ). 

Stay Motivated!

- Motivation is a complex phenomenon which occurs in our brains. 
- Staying motivated can prove extremely challenge when we face barriers of stress. It involves biological, emotional, social and cognitive forces that activate behaviour. 
- We can adopt simple measures to help us get through the roughest of days and maintain our motivation through understanding what processes our brains to cause us to feel stressed. 

Did you know?

- The feelings from stress are directed through our sensory channels. 
- When our sensory channels are blocked or occupied from an external activity, our experiences aren’t as intense or vivid. 
- In other words, when we’re physically occupied our minds aren’t focused or concentrated on whatever is stressing us. 
- This is why some of the best stress reducers are physical activities. That’s what makes stress balls and Baoding balls so effective. 

Squeeze your problems away!

- Research has shown that our brains take in and process a lot of information that comes through our hands. 
- When squeezing a stress ball, your brain has to use a lot of its resources to process the sensation and activity coming in through your hand. 
- This means it has less resources to dedicate to your stress. 

Add some vibrancy and humor into your life!

So the next time you are feeling the blues, reach out for a Pure Origins Funny Humor Stress Ball to brighten your day with a smile. Uplift your spirit visually from our amusing handpicked quotes and designs. Perfect for those days when we are feeling low and need some motivation to keep our chin up!
feature_bullets: STAY HOME | STAY MOTIVATED: Get through the roughness of lockdown and maintain motivation with a smile on your face :)

SENSORY: Physically occupy your mind to re-direct sensory channels and reduce daily feelings of stress. Fidget Accessory for Stress Relief, Special Needs, Focusing, Anxiety, Motivation, ADHD, ADD, Autism and Team Building.
HUMOR: Brighten up your day with these cute light-hearted funny handpicked quotes | Keep Calm and Smile :) | Keep Calm and Squeeze! | Keep Calm and Be Awesome | Face Palm and Carry on

PERFECT GIFT: The perfect gift idea for the office, teachers, students and colleagues with high anger and anxiety. Pack of four means you can distribute across all the main areas in your daily life such as your room, desk, car and more! Stress relief will always be within an arms length away.
BULK SAVINGS: 15% OFF when buying 3 or more Pure Origins Keep Calm packs. Offer will be applied at the checkout automatically, no coupon code required.
